datasources.name: Kubernetes
datasources.description: Logz.io Uses OpenTelemetry and Fluentd with Helm charts to deploy and monitor Kubernetes architecture

params.name: envID
params.label: Environment Name
params.description: The name for your environments identifier, to easily identify the telemetry data for each environment.
params.hint: By typing an environment name, the name will be added as a label to the telemetry data of your environment.

params.name: isTaint
params.label: Taints and Tolerations
params.description: Taints allow a node to repel a series of pods. Tolerations are applied to pods and allow them to schedule onto nodes with matching taints. Enable to force deployment on all pods.
params.hint: By checking this option the Logz.io Telemetry Collector will be deployed on all nodes.

telemetries.hint: Switch the toggle on if you want Logz.io Telemetry Collector to collect logs from your Kubernetes cluster components and applications pods
